The '''Siege of Old Wyk''' was a battle of the [[Greyjoy Rebellion]]. Following the destruction of the [[Iron Fleet]] at the [[Battle of Fair Isle]], the [[Iron Throne|royal]] fleet mounted a counterattack against the [[Iron Islands]]. While [[Great Wyk]], the largest of the [[Iron Islands]], [[Siege of Great Wyk|fell]] to [[Stannis Baratheon]], Ser [[Barristan Selmy]] of the [[Kingsguard]] subdued [[Old Wyk]], paving the way for the complete defeat of the rebellion at the [[Siege of Pyke]].<ref>"[[Greyjoy Rebellion (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Barristan Selmy led an assault of Old Wyk during the Greyjoy Rebellion.
